calculators.options package¶

Submodules¶

calculators.options.bsm module¶

class calculators.options.bsm.Option¶

Bases: object

Option class to calculate option pricing for multiple strategies with Black-Scholes-Merton formula. The class is created without initializing any parameters so they must be provided explicitly.

back_spread(spot_price, expiration_date, long_contracts, long_price, long_type, long_strike_price, long_risk_free_rate, long_dividend_yield, long_volatility, ratio, short_contracts, short_price, short_type, short_strike_price, short_risk_free_rate, short_dividend_yield, short_volatility, graph_type, graph_profile)¶
Displays calculated option values for the back spread strategy:

Short one ITM option Long ratio * OTM options

Parameters

  • spot_price – (float) underlying stock price

  • expiration_date – (str) expiration date

  • long_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for long option

  • long_price – (float) ask price for long option

  • long_type – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for long option

  • long_strike_price – (float) strike price for long option

  • long_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for long option

  • long_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for long option

  • long_volatility – (float) implied volatility for long option

  • ratio – (int) ratio for long option, it should be twice as # contracts for short option

  • short_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for short option

  • short_price – (float) ask price for short option

  • short_type – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for short option

  • short_strike_price – (float) strike price for short option

  • short_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for short option

  • short_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for short option

  • short_volatility – (float) implied volatility for short option

  • graph_type – (str) graph type such as ‘table’, ‘graph’, or ‘both’

  • graph_profile – (str) graph profile such as ‘pnl’, ‘risk’ or ‘option/spread’

Returns

annotated heatmap table and/or graph traces with calculated results

butterfly(spot_price, expiration_date, lower_contracts, lower_price, lower_option, lower_strike_price, lower_risk_free_rate, lower_dividend_yield, lower_volatility, middle_contracts, middle_price, middle_option, middle_strike_price, middle_risk_free_rate, middle_dividend_yield, middle_volatility, upper_contracts, upper_price, upper_option, upper_strike_price, upper_risk_free_rate, upper_dividend_yield, upper_volatility, graph_type, graph_profile)¶
Displays calculated option values for the butterfly strategy:

Long one ITM option Short two ATM options Long one OTM option

Parameters

  • spot_price – (float) underlying stock price

  • expiration_date – (str) expiration date

  • lower_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy for lower wing option

  • lower_price – (float) ask price for lower wing option

  • lower_option – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for lower wing option

  • lower_strike_price – (float) strike price for lower wing option

  • lower_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for lower wing option

  • lower_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for lower wing option

  • lower_volatility – (float) implied volatility for lower wing option

  • middle_contracts – (int) # of contracts to write for middle wing option

  • middle_price – (float) bid price for middle wing option

  • middle_option – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for middle wing option

  • middle_strike_price – (float) strike price for middle wing option

  • middle_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for middle wing option

  • middle_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for middle wing option

  • middle_volatility – (float) implied volatility for middle wing option

  • upper_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy for upper wing option

  • upper_price – (float) ask price for upper wing option

  • upper_option – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for upper wing option

  • upper_strike_price – (float) strike price for upper wing option

  • upper_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for upper wing option

  • upper_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for upper wing option

  • upper_volatility – (float) implied volatility for upper wing option

  • graph_type – (str) graph type such as ‘table’, ‘graph’, or ‘both’

  • graph_profile – (str) graph profile such as ‘pnl’, ‘risk’ or ‘option/spread’

Returns

annotated heatmap table and/or graph traces with calculated results

call_put(spot_price, expiration_date, action, contracts, option_price, option_type, strike_price, risk_free_rate, dividend_yield, volatility, graph_type, graph_profile)¶

Displays calculated option values for the long/short call or long/short put strategy.

Parameters

  • spot_price – (float) underlying stock price

  • expiration_date – (str) expiration date

  • action – (str) whether the action is a buy or write

  • contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write

  • option_price – (float) bid/ask price per option

  • option_type – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type

  • strike_price – (float) strike price

  • risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate

  • dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield

  • volatility – (float) implied volatility

  • graph_type – (str) graph type such as ‘table’, ‘graph’, or ‘both’

  • graph_profile – (str) graph profile such as ‘pnl’, ‘risk’ or ‘option/spread’

Returns

annotated heatmap table and/or graph traces with calculated results

collar(spot_price, expiration_date, num_shares, long_contracts, long_price, long_type, long_strike_price, long_risk_free_rate, long_dividend_yield, long_volatility, short_contracts, short_price, short_type, short_strike_price, short_risk_free_rate, short_dividend_yield, short_volatility, graph_type, graph_profile)¶
Displays calculated option values for the collar strategy:

Long one OTM put Short one OTM call

Parameters

  • spot_price – (float) underlying stock price

  • expiration_date – (str) expiration date

  • num_shares – (int) # of shares of the underlying stock to hold

  • long_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for long option

  • long_price – (float) ask price for long option

  • long_type – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for long option

  • long_strike_price – (float) strike price for long option

  • long_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for long option

  • long_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for long option

  • long_volatility – (float) implied volatility for long option

  • ratio – (int) ratio for long option, it should be twice as # contracts for short option

  • short_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for short option

  • short_price – (float) ask price for short option

  • short_type – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for short option

  • short_strike_price – (float) strike price for short option

  • short_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for short option

  • short_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for short option

  • short_volatility – (float) implied volatility for short option

  • graph_type – (str) graph type such as ‘table’, ‘graph’, or ‘both’

  • graph_profile – (str) graph profile such as ‘pnl’, ‘risk’ or ‘option/spread’

Returns

annotated heatmap table and/or graph traces with calculated results

covered_call(spot_price, expiration_date, num_shares, contracts, option_price, strike_price, risk_free_rate, dividend_yield, volatility, graph_type, graph_profile)¶

Displays calculated option values for the covered call strategy.

Parameters

  • spot_price – (float) underlying stock price

  • expiration_date – (str) expiration date

  • contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write

  • option_price – (float) bid/ask price per option

  • strike_price – (float) strike price

  • risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate

  • dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield

  • volatility – (float) implied volatility

  • graph_type – (str) graph type such as ‘table’, ‘graph’, or ‘both’

  • graph_profile – (str) graph profile such as ‘pnl’, ‘risk’ or ‘option/spread’

Para num_shares

(int) # of shares of the underlying stock to hold

Returns

annotated heatmap table and/or graph traces with calculated results

covered_strangle(spot_price, expiration_date, num_shares, short_call_contracts, short_call_price, short_call_strike_price, short_call_risk_free_rate, short_call_dividend_yield, short_call_volatility, short_put_contracts, short_put_price, short_put_strike_price, short_put_risk_free_rate, short_put_dividend_yield, short_put_volatility, graph_type, graph_profile)¶
Displays calculated option values for the strangle strategy:

Short one OTM put Short one OTM call

Parameters

  • spot_price – (float) underlying stock price

  • expiration_date – (str) expiration date

  • num_shares – (int) # of shares of the underlying stock to hold

  • short_call_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for short call option

  • short_call_price – (float) bid price for short call option

  • short_call_strike_price – (float) strike price for short call option

  • short_call_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for short call option

  • short_call_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for short call option

  • short_call_volatility – (float) implied volatility for short call option

  • short_put_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for short put option

  • short_put_price – (float) bid price for short put option

  • short_put_strike_price – (float) strike price for short put option

  • short_put_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for short put option

  • short_put_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for short put option

  • short_put_volatility – (float) implied volatility for short put option

  • graph_type – (str) graph type such as ‘table’, ‘graph’, or ‘both’

  • graph_profile – (str) graph profile such as ‘pnl’, ‘risk’ or ‘option/spread’

Returns

annotated heatmap table and/or graph traces with calculated results

diagonal_spread(spot_price, expiration_date, long_contracts, long_price, long_type, long_strike_price, long_risk_free_rate, long_dividend_yield, long_volatility, short_contracts, short_price, short_type, short_strike_price, short_risk_free_rate, short_dividend_yield, short_volatility, graph_type, graph_profile)¶

Displays calculated option values for the diagonal spread strategy: Long and short position on two options, usually at different strikes price

Parameters

  • spot_price – (float) underlying stock price

  • expiration_date – (str) expiration date

  • long_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for long option

  • long_price – (float) ask price for long option

  • long_type – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for long option

  • long_strike_price – (float) strike price for long option

  • long_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for long option

  • long_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for long option

  • long_volatility – (float) implied volatility for long option

  • ratio – (int) ratio for long option, it should be twice as # contracts for short option

  • short_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for short option

  • short_price – (float) ask price for short option

  • short_type – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for short option

  • short_strike_price – (float) strike price for short option

  • short_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for short option

  • short_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for short option

  • short_volatility – (float) implied volatility for short option

  • graph_type – (str) graph type such as ‘table’, ‘graph’, or ‘both’

  • graph_profile – (str) graph profile such as ‘pnl’, ‘risk’ or ‘option/spread’

Returns

annotated heatmap table and/or graph traces with calculated results

double_diagonal(spot_price, expiration_date, long_put_price, long_put_strike_price, long_put_risk_free_rate, long_put_dividend_yield, long_put_volatility, long_put_contracts, short_put_price, short_put_strike_price, short_put_risk_free_rate, short_put_dividend_yield, short_put_volatility, short_put_contracts, short_call_price, short_call_strike_price, short_call_risk_free_rate, short_call_dividend_yield, short_call_volatility, short_call_contracts, long_call_price, long_call_strike_price, long_call_risk_free_rate, long_call_dividend_yield, long_call_volatility, long_call_contracts, graph_type, graph_profile)¶
Displays calculated option values for the double diagonal strategy.

This strategy combines a diagonal put spread and diagonal call spread.

Parameters

  • spot_price – (float) underlying stock price

  • expiration_date – (str) expiration date

  • long_put_price – (float) ask price for long put option

  • long_put_strike_price – (float) strike price for long put option

  • long_put_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for long put option

  • long_put_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for long put option

  • long_put_volatility – (float) implied volatility for long put option

  • long_put_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for long put option

  • short_put_price – (float) bid price for short put option

  • short_put_strike_price – (float) strike price for short put option

  • short_put_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for short put option

  • short_put_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for short put option

  • short_put_volatility – (float) implied volatility for short put option

  • short_put_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for short put option

  • short_call_price – (float) bid price for short call option

  • short_call_strike_price – (float) strike price for short call option

  • short_call_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for short call option

  • short_call_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for short call option

  • short_call_volatility – (float) implied volatility for short call option

  • short_call_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for short call option

  • long_call_price – (float) ask price for long call option

  • long_call_strike_price – (float) strike price for long call option

  • long_call_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for long call option

  • long_call_dividend_yield – (float) implied volatility for long call option

  • long_call_volatility – (float) implied volatility for long call option

  • long_call_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for long call option

  • graph_type – (str) graph type such as ‘table’, ‘graph’, or ‘both’

  • graph_profile – (str) graph profile such as ‘pnl’, ‘risk’ or ‘option/spread’

Returns

annotated heatmap table and/or graph traces with calculated results

eight_legs(spot_price, expiration_date, action_leg_1, contracts_leg_1, price_leg_1, option_leg_1, strike_leg_1, risk_leg_1, dividend_yield_leg_1, volatility_leg_1, action_leg_2, contracts_leg_2, price_leg_2, option_leg_2, strike_leg_2, risk_leg_2, dividend_yield_leg_2, volatility_leg_2, action_leg_3, contracts_leg_3, price_leg_3, option_leg_3, strike_leg_3, risk_leg_3, dividend_yield_leg_3, volatility_leg_3, action_leg_4, contracts_leg_4, price_leg_4, option_leg_4, strike_leg_4, risk_leg_4, dividend_yield_leg_4, volatility_leg_4, action_leg_5, contracts_leg_5, price_leg_5, option_leg_5, strike_leg_5, risk_leg_5, dividend_yield_leg_5, volatility_leg_5, action_leg_6, contracts_leg_6, price_leg_6, option_leg_6, strike_leg_6, risk_leg_6, dividend_yield_leg_6, volatility_leg_6, action_leg_7, contracts_leg_7, price_leg_7, option_leg_7, strike_leg_7, risk_leg_7, dividend_yield_leg_7, volatility_leg_7, action_leg_8, contracts_leg_8, price_leg_8, option_leg_8, strike_leg_8, risk_leg_8, dividend_yield_leg_8, volatility_leg_8, graph_type, graph_profile)¶

Displays calculated option values for the 8 legs strategy.

Parameters

  • spot_price – (float) underlying stock price

  • expiration_date – (str) expiration date

  • action_leg_1 – (str) whether the action is a buy or write for leg 1

  • contracts_leg_1 – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for leg 1

  • price_leg_1 – (float) ask price for leg 1

  • option_leg_1 – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for leg 1

  • strike_leg_1 – (float) strike price for leg 1

  • risk_leg_1 – (float) risk-free interest rate for leg 1

  • dividend_yield_leg_1 – float) dividend yield for leg 1

  • volatility_leg_1 – (float) implied volatility for leg 1

  • action_leg_2 – (str) whether the action is a buy or write for leg 2

  • contracts_leg_2 – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for leg 2

  • price_leg_2 – (float) ask price for leg 2

  • option_leg_2 – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for leg 2

  • strike_leg_2 – (float) strike price for leg 2

  • risk_leg_2 – (float) risk-free interest rate for leg 2

  • dividend_yield_leg_2 – float) dividend yield for leg 2

  • volatility_leg_2 – (float) implied volatility for leg 2

  • action_leg_1 – (str) whether the action is a buy or write for leg 3

  • contracts_leg_1 – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for leg 3

  • price_leg_3 – (float) ask price for leg 3

  • option_leg_3 – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for leg 3

  • strike_leg_3 – (float) strike price for leg 3

  • risk_leg_3 – (float) risk-free interest rate for leg 3

  • dividend_yield_leg_3 – float) dividend yield for leg 3

  • volatility_leg_3 – (float) implied volatility for leg 3

  • action_leg_4 – (str) whether the action is a buy or write for leg 4

  • contracts_leg_4 – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for leg 4

  • price_leg_4 – (float) ask price for leg 4

  • option_leg_4 – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for leg 4

  • strike_leg_4 – (float) strike price for leg 4

  • risk_leg_4 – (float) risk-free interest rate for leg 4

  • dividend_yield_leg_4 – float) dividend yield for leg 4

  • volatility_leg_4 – (float) implied volatility for leg 4

  • action_leg_5 – (str) whether the action is a buy or write for leg 5

  • contracts_leg_5 – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for leg 5

  • price_leg_5 – (float) ask price for leg 5

  • option_leg_5 – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for leg 5

  • strike_leg_5 – (float) strike price for leg 5

  • risk_leg_5 – (float) risk-free interest rate for leg 5

  • dividend_yield_leg_5 – float) dividend yield for leg 5

  • volatility_leg_5 – (float) implied volatility for leg 5

  • action_leg_6 – (str) whether the action is a buy or write for leg 6

  • contracts_leg_6 – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for leg 6

  • price_leg_6 – (float) ask price for leg 6

  • option_leg_6 – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for leg 6

  • strike_leg_6 – (float) strike price for leg 6

  • risk_leg_6 – (float) risk-free interest rate for leg 6

  • dividend_yield_leg_6 – float) dividend yield for leg 6

  • volatility_leg_6 – (float) implied volatility for leg 6

  • action_leg_7 – (str) whether the action is a buy or write for leg 7

  • contracts_leg_7 – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for leg 7

  • price_leg_7 – (float) ask price for leg 7

  • option_leg_7 – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for leg 7

  • strike_leg_7 – (float) strike price for leg 7

  • risk_leg_7 – (float) risk-free interest rate for leg 7

  • dividend_yield_leg_7 – float) dividend yield for leg 7

  • volatility_leg_7 – (float) implied volatility for leg 7

  • action_leg_8 – (str) whether the action is a buy or write for leg 8

  • contracts_leg_8 – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for leg 8

  • price_leg_8 – (float) ask price for leg 8

  • option_leg_8 – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for leg 8

  • strike_leg_8 – (float) strike price for leg 8

  • risk_leg_8 – (float) risk-free interest rate for leg 8

  • dividend_yield_leg_8 – float) dividend yield for leg 8

  • volatility_leg_8 – (float) implied volatility for leg 8

  • graph_type – (str) graph type such as ‘table’, ‘graph’, or ‘both’

  • graph_profile – (str) graph profile such as ‘pnl’, ‘risk’ or ‘option/spread’

Returns

annotated heatmap table and/or graph traces with calculated results

five_legs(spot_price, expiration_date, action_leg_1, contracts_leg_1, price_leg_1, option_leg_1, strike_leg_1, risk_leg_1, dividend_yield_leg_1, volatility_leg_1, action_leg_2, contracts_leg_2, price_leg_2, option_leg_2, strike_leg_2, risk_leg_2, dividend_yield_leg_2, volatility_leg_2, action_leg_3, contracts_leg_3, price_leg_3, option_leg_3, strike_leg_3, risk_leg_3, dividend_yield_leg_3, volatility_leg_3, action_leg_4, contracts_leg_4, price_leg_4, option_leg_4, strike_leg_4, risk_leg_4, dividend_yield_leg_4, volatility_leg_4, action_leg_5, contracts_leg_5, price_leg_5, option_leg_5, strike_leg_5, risk_leg_5, dividend_yield_leg_5, volatility_leg_5, graph_type, graph_profile)¶

Displays calculated option values for the 5 legs strategy.

Parameters

  • spot_price – (float) underlying stock price

  • expiration_date – (str) expiration date

  • action_leg_1 – (str) whether the action is a buy or write for leg 1

  • contracts_leg_1 – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for leg 1

  • price_leg_1 – (float) ask price for leg 1

  • option_leg_1 – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for leg 1

  • strike_leg_1 – (float) strike price for leg 1

  • risk_leg_1 – (float) risk-free interest rate for leg 1

  • dividend_yield_leg_1 – float) dividend yield for leg 1

  • volatility_leg_1 – (float) implied volatility for leg 1

  • action_leg_2 – (str) whether the action is a buy or write for leg 2

  • contracts_leg_2 – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for leg 2

  • price_leg_2 – (float) ask price for leg 2

  • option_leg_2 – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for leg 2

  • strike_leg_2 – (float) strike price for leg 2

  • risk_leg_2 – (float) risk-free interest rate for leg 2

  • dividend_yield_leg_2 – float) dividend yield for leg 2

  • volatility_leg_2 – (float) implied volatility for leg 2

  • action_leg_3 – (str) whether the action is a buy or write for leg 3

  • contracts_leg_3 – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for leg 3

  • price_leg_3 – (float) ask price for leg 3

  • option_leg_3 – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for leg 3

  • strike_leg_3 – (float) strike price for leg 3

  • risk_leg_3 – (float) risk-free interest rate for leg 3

  • dividend_yield_leg_3 – float) dividend yield for leg 3

  • volatility_leg_3 – (float) implied volatility for leg 3

  • action_leg_4 – (str) whether the action is a buy or write for leg 4

  • contracts_leg_4 – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for leg 4

  • price_leg_4 – (float) ask price for leg 4

  • option_leg_4 – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for leg 4

  • strike_leg_4 – (float) strike price for leg 4

  • risk_leg_4 – (float) risk-free interest rate for leg 4

  • dividend_yield_leg_4 – float) dividend yield for leg 4

  • volatility_leg_4 – (float) implied volatility for leg 4

  • action_leg_5 – (str) whether the action is a buy or write for leg 5

  • contracts_leg_5 – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for leg 5

  • price_leg_5 – (float) ask price for leg 5

  • option_leg_5 – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for leg 5

  • strike_leg_5 – (float) strike price for leg 5

  • risk_leg_5 – (float) risk-free interest rate for leg 5

  • dividend_yield_leg_5 – float) dividend yield for leg 5

  • volatility_leg_5 – (float) implied volatility for leg 5

  • graph_type – (str) graph type such as ‘table’, ‘graph’, or ‘both’

  • graph_profile – (str) graph profile such as ‘pnl’, ‘risk’ or ‘option/spread’

Returns

annotated heatmap table and/or graph traces with calculated results

four_legs(spot_price, expiration_date, action_leg_1, contracts_leg_1, price_leg_1, option_leg_1, strike_leg_1, risk_leg_1, dividend_yield_leg_1, volatility_leg_1, action_leg_2, contracts_leg_2, price_leg_2, option_leg_2, strike_leg_2, risk_leg_2, dividend_yield_leg_2, volatility_leg_2, action_leg_3, contracts_leg_3, price_leg_3, option_leg_3, strike_leg_3, risk_leg_3, dividend_yield_leg_3, volatility_leg_3, action_leg_4, contracts_leg_4, price_leg_4, option_leg_4, strike_leg_4, risk_leg_4, dividend_yield_leg_4, volatility_leg_4, graph_type, graph_profile)¶

Displays calculated option values for the 4 legs strategy.

Parameters

  • spot_price – (float) underlying stock price

  • expiration_date – (str) expiration date

  • action_leg_1 – (str) whether the action is a buy or write for leg 1

  • contracts_leg_1 – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for leg 1

  • price_leg_1 – (float) ask price for leg 1

  • option_leg_1 – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for leg 1

  • strike_leg_1 – (float) strike price for leg 1

  • risk_leg_1 – (float) risk-free interest rate for leg 1

  • dividend_yield_leg_1 – float) dividend yield for leg 1

  • volatility_leg_1 – (float) implied volatility for leg 1

  • action_leg_2 – (str) whether the action is a buy or write for leg 2

  • contracts_leg_2 – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for leg 2

  • price_leg_2 – (float) ask price for leg 2

  • option_leg_2 – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for leg 2

  • strike_leg_2 – (float) strike price for leg 2

  • risk_leg_2 – (float) risk-free interest rate for leg 2

  • dividend_yield_leg_2 – float) dividend yield for leg 2

  • volatility_leg_2 – (float) implied volatility for leg 2

  • action_leg_1 – (str) whether the action is a buy or write for leg 1

  • contracts_leg_1 – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for leg 1

  • price_leg_3 – (float) ask price for leg 3

  • option_leg_3 – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for leg 3

  • strike_leg_3 – (float) strike price for leg 3

  • risk_leg_3 – (float) risk-free interest rate for leg 3

  • dividend_yield_leg_3 – float) dividend yield for leg 3

  • volatility_leg_3 – (float) implied volatility for leg 3

  • action_leg_4 – (str) whether the action is a buy or write for leg 1

  • contracts_leg_4 – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for leg 1

  • price_leg_4 – (float) ask price for leg 4

  • option_leg_4 – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for leg 4

  • strike_leg_4 – (float) strike price for leg 4

  • risk_leg_4 – (float) risk-free interest rate for leg 4

  • dividend_yield_leg_4 – float) dividend yield for leg 4

  • volatility_leg_4 – (float) implied volatility for leg 4

  • graph_type – (str) graph type such as ‘table’, ‘graph’, or ‘both’

  • graph_profile – (str) graph profile such as ‘pnl’, ‘risk’ or ‘option/spread’

Returns

annotated heatmap table and/or graph traces with calculated results

iron_condor(spot_price, expiration_date, long_put_price, long_put_strike_price, long_put_risk_free_rate, long_put_dividend_yield, long_put_volatility, long_put_contracts, short_put_price, short_put_strike_price, short_put_risk_free_rate, short_put_dividend_yield, short_put_volatility, short_put_contracts, short_call_price, short_call_strike_price, short_call_risk_free_rate, short_call_dividend_yield, short_call_volatility, short_call_contracts, long_call_price, long_call_strike_price, long_call_risk_free_rate, long_call_dividend_yield, long_call_volatility, long_call_contracts, graph_type, graph_profile)¶
Displays calculated option values for the iron condor strategy:

Long one OTM put Short one OTM put with a higher strike Short one OTM call Long one OTM call with a higher strike Akin to having a long strangle inside a larger short strangle (or vice-versa)

Parameters

  • spot_price – (float) underlying stock price

  • expiration_date – (str) expiration date

  • long_put_price – (float) ask price for long put option

  • long_put_strike_price – (float) strike price for long put option

  • long_put_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for long put option

  • long_put_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for long put option

  • long_put_volatility – (float) implied volatility for long put option

  • long_put_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for long put option

  • short_put_price – (float) bid price for short put option

  • short_put_strike_price – (float) strike price for short put option

  • short_put_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for short put option

  • short_put_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for short put option

  • short_put_volatility – (float) implied volatility for short put option

  • short_put_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for short put option

  • short_call_price – (float) bid price for short call option

  • short_call_strike_price – (float) strike price for short call option

  • short_call_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for short call option

  • short_call_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for short call option

  • short_call_volatility – (float) implied volatility for short call option

  • short_call_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for short call option

  • long_call_price – (float) ask price for long call option

  • long_call_strike_price – (float) strike price for long call option

  • long_call_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for long call option

  • long_call_dividend_yield – (float) implied volatility for long call option

  • long_call_volatility – (float) implied volatility for long call option

  • long_call_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for long call option

  • graph_type – (str) graph type such as ‘table’, ‘graph’, or ‘both’

  • graph_profile – (str) graph profile such as ‘pnl’, ‘risk’ or ‘option/spread’

Returns

annotated heatmap table and/or graph traces with calculated results

reverse_conversion(spot_price, expiration_date, num_shares, long_type, long_price, long_strike_price, long_risk_free_rate, long_dividend_yield, long_volatility, long_contracts, short_type, short_price, short_strike_price, short_risk_free_rate, short_dividend_yield, short_volatility, short_contracts, graph_type, graph_profile)¶
Displays calculated option values for the reverse conversion strategy:

Sell a put Buy a call to create a synthetic long position Short the underlying stock

Parameters

  • spot_price – (float) underlying stock price

  • expiration_date – (str) expiration date

  • num_shares – (int) # of shares of the underlying stock to hold

  • long_type – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for long option

  • long_price – (float) ask price for long option

  • long_strike_price – (float) strike price for long option

  • long_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for long option

  • long_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for long option

  • long_volatility – (float) implied volatility for long option

  • long_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for long option

  • short_type – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for short option

  • short_price – (float) ask price for short option

  • short_strike_price – (float) strike price for short option

  • short_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for short option

  • short_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for short option

  • short_volatility – (float) implied volatility for short option

  • short_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for short option

  • graph_type – (str) graph type such as ‘table’, ‘graph’, or ‘both’

  • graph_profile – (str) graph profile such as ‘pnl’, ‘risk’ or ‘option/spread’

Returns

annotated heatmap table and/or graph traces with calculated results

six_legs(spot_price, expiration_date, action_leg_1, contracts_leg_1, price_leg_1, option_leg_1, strike_leg_1, risk_leg_1, dividend_yield_leg_1, volatility_leg_1, action_leg_2, contracts_leg_2, price_leg_2, option_leg_2, strike_leg_2, risk_leg_2, dividend_yield_leg_2, volatility_leg_2, action_leg_3, contracts_leg_3, price_leg_3, option_leg_3, strike_leg_3, risk_leg_3, dividend_yield_leg_3, volatility_leg_3, action_leg_4, contracts_leg_4, price_leg_4, option_leg_4, strike_leg_4, risk_leg_4, dividend_yield_leg_4, volatility_leg_4, action_leg_5, contracts_leg_5, price_leg_5, option_leg_5, strike_leg_5, risk_leg_5, dividend_yield_leg_5, volatility_leg_5, action_leg_6, contracts_leg_6, price_leg_6, option_leg_6, strike_leg_6, risk_leg_6, dividend_yield_leg_6, volatility_leg_6, graph_type, graph_profile)¶

Displays calculated option values for the 6 legs strategy.

Parameters

  • spot_price – (float) underlying stock price

  • expiration_date – (str) expiration date

  • action_leg_1 – (str) whether the action is a buy or write for leg 1

  • contracts_leg_1 – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for leg 1

  • price_leg_1 – (float) ask price for leg 1

  • price_leg_4 – (float) ask price for leg 4

  • option_leg_4 – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for leg 4

  • strike_leg_4 – (float) strike price for leg 4

  • risk_leg_4 – (float) risk-free interest rate for leg 4

  • dividend_yield_leg_4 – float) dividend yield for leg 4

spread(spot_price, expiration_date, long_contracts, long_price, long_type, long_strike_price, long_risk_free_rate, long_dividend_yield, long_volatility, short_contracts, short_price, short_type, short_strike_price, short_risk_free_rate, short_dividend_yield, short_volatility, graph_type, graph_profile)¶

Displays calculated option values for spread strategies: credit, call, put and calendar.

Parameters

  • spot_price – (float) underlying stock price

  • expiration_date – (str) expiration date

  • long_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for long option

  • long_price – (float) ask price for long option

  • long_type – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for long option

  • long_strike_price – (float) strike price for long option

  • long_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for long option

  • long_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for long option

  • long_volatility – (float) implied volatility for long option

  • short_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for short option

  • short_price – (float) ask price for short option

  • short_type – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for short option

  • short_strike_price – (float) strike price for short option

  • short_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for short option

  • short_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for short option

  • short_volatility – (float) implied volatility for short option

  • graph_type – (str) graph type such as ‘table’, ‘graph’, or ‘both’

  • graph_profile – (str) graph profile such as ‘pnl’, ‘risk’ or ‘option/spread’

Returns

annotated heatmap table and/or graph traces with calculated results

straddle(spot_price, expiration_date, strike_price, long_call_contracts, long_call_price, long_call_risk_free_rate, long_call_dividend_yield, long_call_volatility, long_put_contracts, long_put_price, long_put_risk_free_rate, long_put_dividend_yield, long_put_volatility, graph_type, graph_profile)¶
Displays calculated option values for the straddle strategy:

  • Long one ATM put

  • Long one ATM call

Both have the same strike price

Parameters

  • spot_price – (float) underlying stock price

  • expiration_date – (str) expiration date

  • strike_price – (float) strike price for long call and long put option

  • long_call_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for long call option

  • long_call_price – (float) ask price for long call option

  • long_call_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for long call option

  • long_call_dividend_yield – (float) implied volatility for long call option

  • long_call_volatility – (float) implied volatility for long call option

  • long_put_contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for long put option

  • long_put_price – (float) ask price for long put option

  • long_put_risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate for long put option

  • long_put_dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield for long put option

  • long_put_volatility – (float) implied volatility for long put option

  • graph_type – (str) graph type such as ‘table’, ‘graph’, or ‘both’

  • graph_profile – (str) graph profile such as ‘pnl’, ‘risk’ or ‘option/spread’

Returns

annotated heatmap table and/or graph traces with calculated results

synthetic_put(spot_price, expiration_date, num_shares, contracts, option_price, strike_price, risk_free_rate, dividend_yield, volatility, graph_type, graph_profile)¶
Displays calculated option values for the synthetic put strategy:

Long a call option Short the equivalent amount of the underlying stock

Parameters

  • spot_price – (float) underlying stock price

  • expiration_date – (str) expiration date

  • contracts – (int) # of contracts to buy/write

  • option_price – (float) bid/ask price per option

  • strike_price – (float) strike price

  • risk_free_rate – (float) risk-free interest rate

  • dividend_yield – (float) dividend yield

  • volatility – (float) implied volatility

  • graph_type – (str) graph type such as ‘table’, ‘graph’, or ‘both’

  • graph_profile – (str) graph profile such as ‘pnl’, ‘risk’ or ‘option/spread’

Para num_shares

(int) # of shares of the underlying stock to hold

Returns

annotated heatmap table and/or graph traces with calculated results

three_legs(spot_price, expiration_date, action_leg_1, contracts_leg_1, price_leg_1, option_leg_1, strike_leg_1, risk_leg_1, dividend_yield_leg_1, volatility_leg_1, action_leg_2, contracts_leg_2, price_leg_2, option_leg_2, strike_leg_2, risk_leg_2, dividend_yield_leg_2, volatility_leg_2, action_leg_3, contracts_leg_3, price_leg_3, option_leg_3, strike_leg_3, risk_leg_3, dividend_yield_leg_3, volatility_leg_3, graph_type, graph_profile)¶

Displays calculated option values for the 3 legs strategy.

Parameters

  • spot_price – (float) underlying stock price

  • expiration_date – (str) expiration date

  • action_leg_1 – (str) whether the action is a buy or write for leg 1

  • contracts_leg_1 – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for leg 1

  • price_leg_1 – (float) ask price for leg 1

  • option_leg_1 – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for leg 1

  • strike_leg_1 – (float) strike price for leg 1

  • risk_leg_1 – (float) risk-free interest rate for leg 1

  • dividend_yield_leg_1 – float) dividend yield for leg 1

  • volatility_leg_1 – (float) implied volatility for leg 1

  • action_leg_2 – (str) whether the action is a buy or write for leg 2

  • contracts_leg_2 – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for leg 2

  • price_leg_2 – (float) ask price for leg 2

  • option_leg_2 – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for leg 2

  • strike_leg_2 – (float) strike price for leg 2

  • risk_leg_2 – (float) risk-free interest rate for leg 2

  • dividend_yield_leg_2 – float) dividend yield for leg 2

  • volatility_leg_2 – (float) implied volatility for leg 2

  • action_leg_1 – (str) whether the action is a buy or write for leg 1

  • contracts_leg_1 – (int) # of contracts to buy/write for leg 1

  • price_leg_3 – (float) ask price for leg 3

  • option_leg_3 – (str) ‘put’ or ‘call’ option type for leg 3

  • strike_leg_3 – (float) strike price for leg 3

  • risk_leg_3 – (float) risk-free interest rate for leg 3

  • dividend_yield_leg_3 – float) dividend yield for leg 3

  • volatility_leg_3 – (float) implied volatility for leg 3

  • graph_type – (str) graph type such as ‘table’, ‘graph’, or ‘both’

  • graph_profile – (str) graph profile such as ‘pnl’, ‘risk’ or ‘option/spread’

Returns

annotated heatmap table and/or graph traces with calculated results
